name: Tetrageddon Games (itch)
description:
"A relic of the internet, haunted by skeletons of its past. "

Click here to play!

Tetrageddon Games is the IGF Nuovo Award winning, Indie Cade nominee, SXSW Interactive Award nominee, etc... online arcade of Flash Games.
I recently rebuilt it so that it runs without Flash, and it can continue to live. I'm tremendously proud of this newest version and feel that it's the best rendition of it yet.
I'm posting this to itch so that more people can find it, or support it if they want.

Tetrageddon Games is probably the weirdest most tortured not-a-game game you can experience. It is the internet condensed into a slew of interactive experiences that serve as something of a love-letter to the web of the past.

The experience is thoroughly riddled with hidden extras and tangents. Much like a virtual arcade, it largely consists of a collection of games. Among others, these include: Anatomically Incorrect Dinosaurs, FROGGY (It's Hungry), and Electric Love Potatoes.

Tetrageddon Games is a web project. Most of it runs in the browser, and then eventually finds its way to your desktop. It's net-art as game, website-as-game...
Itch.io is treated as part of the game, where pieces of the website are hidden across itch for you to find.
